item.description:
It's fashion forward, fabulous shoes essential at this gala to benefit the Accelerated Cure Project for MS.

This national signature event is presented to raise funds and bring awareness, and features a full evening of music, dancing, cocktails, appetizers, and shoe-gazing; not to mention, a chance to compete for title of Best-in-Shoe in a runway "walk-off" presided over by a panel of fashion editors, socialites, and industry experts. Shoe lovers, fashion fanatics, and those in support of a cure for MS won't want to miss this fantastic evening of footwear and fun! The event raises money for the Accelerated Cure project, whose mission is to to accelerate the cure of MS by facilitating research that determines the causes and mechanisms of MS.


Attention guys- come and join us for the fun and party with lots of lovely ladies!

Cost: Tickets are $50 in advance and $60 at the door. Get your tickets at:

https://www.acceleratedcure.org/rsvp2011BostonShimmer/tickets.php

   * 7:00-8:30pm: Cocktail Reception with Barefoot Wine and Bubbly and Music by The Music Man
   * 9:30pm: "Best-in-Shoe" Walk-Off, winner presented by Zack Lo Shoes
   * ALL EVENING: Dancing, Hors d'oeuvres, Cash Bar & Signature Drinks, Silent Auction,  and Live Auction
   * 10:30pm: Prizes Awarded for Shoe Walk-Off and Sipping for Stilettos Champagne Raffle
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near ticket area or in event. Please call/text Catherine at 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Shimmer and Shine Ball Stepping out to Cure MS
